definition: characteristic of someone who has risen economically or socially but lacks the social skills appropriate for this new position, a person who has suddenly risen to a higher economic status but has not gained social acceptance of others in that class
details:
adjective
- characteristic of someone who has risen economically or socially but lacks the social skills appropriate for this new position
= synonyms: parvenu
noun
- a person who has suddenly risen to a higher economic status but has not gained social acceptance of others in that class
= synonyms: upstart
